title: Person(s) having right over unauthorisedly encumbered land :- Entitled area collectively against this parcel of land shall be calculated at 50% of entitled area calculated as per clause (ii) and (iii) above, except when occupant(s) of building(s) are being rehabilitated / compensated by such Person(s) and are not being rehabilitated in URS, entitled area towards consideration shall be equal to FSI (1) (--) available on the vacated land area
clause_text: Person(s) having right over unauthorisedly encumbered land :- Entitled area collectively against this parcel of land shall be calculated at 50% of entitled area calculated as per clause (ii) and (iii) above, except when occupant(s) of building(s) are being rehabilitated / compensated by such Person(s) and are not being rehabilitated in URS, entitled area towards consideration shall be equal to FSI (1) (--) available on the vacated land area.
section: Consideration for Land falling under URS -

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
